author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: مقبلاً الی قبلة العالمین لعمری انّ الأمر عظیم عظیم و الیوم عظیم عظیم طوبی لمن نبذ الوری عن ورائه متوجّهاً الی وجه الّذی بنوره اشرقت السّموات و
translation: By the righteousness of Mine own Self! Great, immeasurably great is this Cause! Mighty, inconceivably mighty is this Day! Blessed indeed is the man that hath forsaken all things, and fastened his eyes upon Him Whose face hath shed illumination upon all who are in the heavens and all who are on the earth.
